entry.string: You cannot use UNBOXED mode of the MultiLanguage system unless you have php 4.3.0 with the mbstring extension compiled in
entry.translation: Hinde pwedeng gamitin ang UNBOXED mode ng MultiLanguage system kung wala ang php 4.3.0 na me naka-compile na mbstring extension

entry.string: You should select utf-8 locale as default before selecting UNBOXED mode
entry.translation: Dapat piliin muna ang utf-8 bilang default bago piliin ang UNBOXED mode
